title: Calories in Pizza Rolls
meta_description: Learn calories in pizza rolls for a standard serving of 10 baked rolls, including full nutrition facts, macros, sodium, and preparation tweaks.
assumptions: Standard frozen pizza rolls (e.g., Totino's pepperoni), baked per package instructions, no added toppings or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, baking method, and exact size. Always check product labels for accurate info.

quick_answer.text: 10 baked pizza rolls provide about 240 kcal, 30 g carbs, and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Air-fried instead of oven-baked (reduces oil absorption)

faqs.q: How many calories in one pizza roll?
faqs.a: About 24 kcal per baked pizza roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in pizza rolls?
faqs.a: 10 pizza rolls have roughly 30 g carbs, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are pizza rolls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 10 rolls contain about 450 mg sodiumâ€”nearly 20% of daily value.

faqs.q: Calories in fried vs baked pizza rolls?
faqs.a: Fried adds ~50 kcal per 10 rolls due to extra oil; baked is lower.

faqs.q: How much protein in a serving of pizza rolls?
faqs.a: Around 9 g protein for 10 pizza rolls.
